thread.title: Sportech plots $6.5 million Elk River plant expansion
thread.title_full: Sportech plots $6.5 million Elk River plant expansion

author: Karlee Weinmann
title: Sportech plots $6.5 million Elk River plant expansion
text:
Home / Brief / Sportech plots $6.5 million Elk River plant expansion Sportech plots $6.5 million Elk River plant expansion By: Karlee Weinmann July 29, 2015 1:35 pm 0 Sportech Inc., a manufacturer of motorcycle and snowmobile parts, will inject $6.5 million into an expansion of its Elk River facility and add 43 workers. The project, unveiled Wednesday, includes a new 105,000-square-foot production facility that has room to grow.
